name: save file not found
description:
Welcome to save file not found, a text adventure game where you are in search of the missing file that you desperately need for the plan. Can you find it?

Depends on your play style, it will take you between 10 seconds to 10 minutes to complete the game, though it is recommended that you play the game in full to understand everything.

This game was created as an entry for the game jam "A Game By Its Cover 2019". The cover image belongs to うめぼし and I want to thank them for it.

Thank you for playing!
